summary: This is a brief email forwarding a memo to a warden regarding an after-action review, likely related to Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody. The document appears to be administrative correspondence about standard procedures following an incident.
keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 12, 2019, forwarding a memo to a warden.
The subject references an 'After_Action_Review_Team_NYM', suggesting a review team was formed in New York.
The timing (August 2019) coincides with Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
The email indicates standard administrative procedures were being followed after an incident.
The document is part of the Epstein case files, indicating it relates to the investigation into his death.
